title: Design of Programming Algorithm Learning Utilizing Multi-AI Voice Tutors

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Classroom environment utilizing smartphone-based AI voice output systems and low-spec multimedia

learning_goals: Learners can differentiate and explain three algorithm types: sorting, searching, and dynamic programming
Learners can compare time complexity across algorithm types and apply them to real-world cases
Learners can reproduce algorithm pseudocode with over 80% accuracy in evaluations two weeks after following AI tutor voice guidance

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
